title: S O S -- need help ID'ing this odd sans serif font ASAP!!!
content:
Hi everyone,

I posted this last week on WhatTheFont’s Forum, got no replies.

Can anybody help me out ID’ing this odd sans serif font? It’s part of a customer’s logo and of course they only have it as a low-res jpeg... \*facepalm\*

Any and all assistance would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks,  
John the Fontaholic

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [MFBA logo sun.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130602/http:/typophile.com/files/MFBA%20logo%20sun.jpg) | 66.83 KB |
author: John the Fontaholic

comments.content: Just a guess, but that M is probably an upside-down W. There seems to be some other customization going on too.
